channel.title: Can i pay with paypal?
channel.description: Okay, since i made a few usd by my RS PS. I wonder, can i pay like .com and buying advertise with just my paypal account? Without having a credit card? Cuz i think i need a god damn credit card -.-

item.title: Can i pay with paypal?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You can use your PayPal account and please stop posting random bullshit here, all this information is on the sites ‘Pay Method(s)’ Information

Read full topic
